de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.publish

Class FeedGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.publish.FeedGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    final class FeedGenerator
extends Object
implements Command
    Generates the feed XML. 1. read all files in posts/ with mod date 2. generate feed object from files 3. write feed.xml
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
